SELECT * FROM tbl_rateinformation t WHERE 1=1
and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile e where e.elPi_RateInformationId = t.pk_RateInformation and e.pk_ElectricPile = #{elcId})

SELECT min(t.raIn_ValleyTimePrice) FROM tbl_rateinformation t WHERE 1=1 and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile e where e.elPi_RateInformationId = t.pk_RateInformation and e.elPi_RelevancePowerStation = #{value})

SELECT pk_RateInformation, raIn_ModelId , raIn_ServiceCharge, raIn_QuantumDate , raIn_StartQuantumDate , raIn_EndQuantumDate , raIn_TimeMarker, raIn_TipTimeTariffPrice , raIn_PeakElectricityPrice , raIn_UsualPrice , raIn_ValleyTimePrice , raIn_TipTimeTariffMoney , raIn_PeakElectricityMoney , raIn_UsualMoney , raIn_ValleyTimeMoney FROM tbl_RateInformation WHERE pk_RateInformation=#{pkRateinformation}

SELECT a.pk_RateInformation, a.raIn_ModelId, a.raIn_ServiceCharge, a.raIn_QuantumDate, a.raIn_StartQuantumDate, a.raIn_EndQuantumDate, a.raIn_TimeMarker, a.raIn_TipTimeTariffPrice, a.raIn_PeakElectricityPrice, a.raIn_UsualPrice, a.raIn_ValleyTimePrice, a.raIn_TipTimeTariffMoney, a.raIn_PeakElectricityMoney, a.raIn_UsualMoney, a.raIn_ValleyTimeMoney, a.raIn_type FROM tbl_rateinformation a, tbl_rate_unique_rela b WHERE a.pk_RateInformation = b.rateinfo_id AND b.cpy_id = ( SELECT p.cpy_id FROM tbl_partner p WHERE partnerKey = #{OperatorID} ) AND b.electricpile_id = ( SELECT e.pk_ElectricPile FROM tbl_electricpile e WHERE e.elPi_ElectricPileCode = #{epCode} ) AND b.level_id = ( SELECT u.level_id FROM tbl_partner p, tbl_company d, tbl_user u, tbl_user_company f WHERE p.partnerKey = #{OperatorID} AND p.cpy_id = d.cpy_id AND d.cpy_id = f.cpy_id AND f.user_id = u.user_id )

SELECT pk_RateInformation, raIn_ModelId , raIn_ServiceCharge, raIn_QuantumDate , raIn_StartQuantumDate , raIn_EndQuantumDate , raIn_TimeMarker, raIn_TipTimeTariffPrice , raIn_PeakElectricityPrice , raIn_UsualPrice , raIn_ValleyTimePrice , raIn_TipTimeTariffMoney , raIn_PeakElectricityMoney , raIn_UsualMoney , raIn_ValleyTimeMoney, raIn_type FROM tbl_RateInformation a, tbl_electricpile e WHERE e.elPi_ElectricPileCode = #{epCode} AND a.pk_RateInformation = e.elPi_RateInformationId
